derivation: or יִשְׁמַעְיָהוּlemma יְשְׁמַעְיָהוּ first vowel, corrected to יִשְׁמַעְיָהוּ; from H8085 (שָׁמַע) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah will hear;
outline:
Ishmaiah = "Jehovah will hear"
  1. a Gibeonite and one of David's mighty warriors
  2. a son of Obadiah and the ruler of the tribe of Zebulun in the time of king David
strongs_def: Jishmajah, the name of two Israelites
